titles: The northern ditty: or, The Scotch-man out-witted by the country damsel. To an excellent new Scotch tune, of Cold and raw the north did blow, &c. A song much in request at Court. This may be printed, R.P.
author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back.,
notes: Attributed to Thomas D'Urfey by Wing.
Verse: "Cold and raw the north did blow ..."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
